about_the_game:
About This Game


Plot

One peaceful day, Queen Quinshua heard that her illegal dakimakura was being made and decided to take action to stop it



'Astana Story -Who Made Dakimakura!-' is a fan game of Korean vertuber 'Queen Shua' created through RPG MAKER MV (hereinafter RMMV).
This is a game where the main goal is to stop the evil(?) plot of her followers, the Chevaliers, and restore peace.


It consists of a total of 5 stages.
The player must control Queenshua with the keyboard and use her special move, Neck Slice, to subdue the fleeing Chevaliers.
The Chevaliers will not attack. How can you attack when the target you need to protect is running towards you? I have no choice but to run away.


At the end, there is a boss battle against the leader of the evil(??) plot.
He'll never go down in one go, so you'll have to attack him multiple times.

Between stages, you can wander around the castle, talk to the Chevaliers, and watch humorous events.
There are events such as getting help from colleagues to solve problems to advance to the next stage.


Find hidden rooms and items and collect collectible elements
If you collect them all, there's nothing special, but it has the effect of making you feel proud.



Manipulation

We recommend using the arrow keys.
detailed_description:
About This Game


Plot

One peaceful day, Queen Quinshua heard that her illegal dakimakura was being made and decided to take action to stop it



'Astana Story -Who Made Dakimakura!-' is a fan game of Korean vertuber 'Queen Shua' created through RPG MAKER MV (hereinafter RMMV).
This is a game where the main goal is to stop the evil(?) plot of her followers, the Chevaliers, and restore peace.


It consists of a total of 5 stages.
The player must control Queenshua with the keyboard and use her special move, Neck Slice, to subdue the fleeing Chevaliers.
The Chevaliers will not attack. How can you attack when the target you need to protect is running towards you? I have no choice but to run away.


At the end, there is a boss battle against the leader of the evil(??) plot.
He'll never go down in one go, so you'll have to attack him multiple times.

Between stages, you can wander around the castle, talk to the Chevaliers, and watch humorous events.
There are events such as getting help from colleagues to solve problems to advance to the next stage.


Find hidden rooms and items and collect collectible elements
If you collect them all, there's nothing special, but it has the effect of making you feel proud.



Manipulation

We recommend using the arrow keys.
name: 아스타나 이야기 ~누가 다키마쿠라 만들었어!~

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtak
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtak

short_description: One peaceful day, Queen Quinshua heard that her illegal dakimakura was being made and decided to take action to stop it
